premise_source_doc_sentence: Whedon co-wrote the Pixar film Toy Story  (  1995  )  , wrote and directed the Firefly film continuation Serenity  (  2005  )  , co-wrote and directed the Internet mini-series Dr. Horrible 's Sing-Along Blog  (  2008  )  , co-wrote and produced the horror comedy The Cabin in the Woods  (  2012  )  , and wrote and directed the Marvel Cinematic Universe superhero films The Avengers  (  2012  )  and its sequel Avengers : Age of Ultron  (  2015  )  .

The episode was ordered in 2012 , after Joss Whedon wrote and directed Marvel 's The Avengers , and was filmed in early 2013 in Los Angeles , California , with some additional filming in Paris , France .
Joss Whedon began developing a S.H.I.E.L.D. pilot following the success of his film Marvel 's The Avengers , and Gregg was confirmed to reprise his role in October 2012 .
